After learning MMA training in order to learn self-defense, Kim found the confidence to become a trainer herself. Kim' s personal mission is to empower, inspire and train women and children so they too can stand up for themselves against bullying. Among her students is 13- year- old Logan Chauvin. Logan was terrorized daily in school by callous bullies. He has been training vigorously with Kim to overcome his experience and is now getting ready for his first real MMA fight. Based on the preferences you mentioned, I would recommend watching "Black Hawk Down". This war drama was released in 2001 and features an intense battle between American marines and Somalis.

Another recommendation that could suit your preferences is "Gladiator". This historical epic film was released in 2000 and directed by Ridley Scott. The movie tells the story of Roman general Maximus, who leads his army to victory after victory over the various barbarian tribes that occupied much of Rome's territory during its period of greatest power.

Both movies feature intense battles between soldiers and enemy forces, as well as themes related to leadership, honor, and justice.
